thread.section_title: Hotel Oceania - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: great location, great staff, great value
thread.title_full: great location, great staff, great value - Review of Hotel Oceania, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: 78couple2go
title: great location, great staff, great value
text: Stayed here at the 2 nights at the beginning and one night at the end of our Italy holiday. Location is great for navigating all of Rome. Rooms were very comfortable. Breakfast was great. Staff was very friendly and took care of any needs.Would definitely stay here again.
